critique: This document describes the withdrawal of land for the use of the War Department as a site for an Army radio station in Point Barrow, Alaska. It was issued in 1933. There is no direct indication of ideological tilt, immigration approach, executive power implications, federalism concerns, national security vs. civil liberties trade-offs, economic regulation, or social inclusion considerations. The document appears to be a straightforward administrative action related to land use for military purposes.
